mapper.sql: SELECT EVENT.ID, EVENT.NAME, EVENT.TIMESTAMP, EVENT.TYPE, EVENT.ACTION, EVENT.CONTENTS, SUBJ.ID AS SUBJECT_ID, SUBJ.ENTITY_ID AS SUBJECT_ENTITY_ID, SUBJ.NAME AS SUBJECT_NAME, SUBJ.EMAIL AS SUBJECT_EMAIL, INIT.ID AS INITIATOR_ID, INIT.ENTITY_ID AS INITIATOR_ENTITY_ID, INIT.NAME AS INITIATOR_NAME, INIT.EMAIL AS INITIATOR_EMAIL, AT.TAG AS TAG FROM AUDIT_EVENTS AS EVENT LEFT JOIN AUDIT_ENTITIES AS SUBJ ON EVENT.SUBJECT_ID = SUBJ.ID LEFT JOIN AUDIT_ENTITIES AS INIT ON EVENT.INITIATOR_ID = INIT.ID LEFT JOIN AUDIT_EVENTS_TAGS AET ON EVENT.ID = AET.EVENT_ID LEFT JOIN AUDIT_TAGS AT ON AET.TAG_ID = AT.ID
